reviews.name: SOG SlimJim XL Folding Knife
reviews.reviewText: Great Carry Knife! I can't even feel it in my pocket usually! Love It....have heard a freind with one complain about rust issues on his.
reviews.title: Great slim design!

reviews.name: SOG SlimJim XL Folding Knife
reviews.reviewText:
I use this professional knife for self protection.
Not cutting rope or boxes. Very sharp.
Had to work with the knife 2-3 weeks to get the assist opening loose.
Get this knife as your back-up.
reviews.title: Tough and Thin

reviews.name: SOG SlimJim XL Folding Knife
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these knives about 3 months ago and love them! They are super thin so they are easy to carry around. Be careful though cuz they are super sharp: sharp enough to shave with! I have noth g negative to say about this knife!
reviews.title: I love my slimjim XL

reviews.name: SOG SlimJim XL Folding Knife
reviews.reviewText:
I've owned my SLIMJIM for almost a year and it has outperformed all other previous knives. I was hesitant due to the price, but decided to treat myself when it was time for a new knife and have never regretted it.

My favorite thing about the SLIMJIM is the design! As the name states it is a slim knife, but that's the beginning:
It is the perfect weight, size, and durability for me.
It is razor sharp right out of the package.
The blade lock is stiff enough to prevent accidents.
The positioning of the clip buries it in your pocket so it isn't obvious.
Blade opening assist!

I liked it so much last year, that I give the SLIMJIM as an occasional gift and as a frequent recommendation.
reviews.title: Near Perfect Pocket Knife!

reviews.name: SOG SlimJim XL Folding Knife
reviews.reviewText: Bought it because it was so slim, and was not disappointed. For its thin size, it is stronger than I expected and has a nice, quick release. It is a good knife to use for cutting, but anything where force or leverage it required to cut I feel like it wouldn't last as long. For what I use it for, I love it.
reviews.title: You Almost Forget its There
